properties.sfomuseum:description: Correspondence from Ogden Mills of Mills Estate Incorporated, to Joseph J. Phillips, Right of Way Agent for City and County of San Francisco, January 28, 1927, concerning terms of three-year lease of 150 acres of Mills Estate in San Bruno for use as temporary airport; two typewritten pages; pencil sketch of property boundary on reverse side of page two.
